name: MoodRing
0:
”Alexa, open mood ring.”
”Why is my ring purple?”
”What does it mean when my mood ring is yellow?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mood ring
des:
Sometimes, you know you're happy, or you know you're feeling a little down in the dumps. But sometimes your mood can be a little more difficult to pinpoint. Now with the help of your mood ring, and this skill, you can ask questions like, What does blue mean, or why is my mood ring red?

Just say, "Alexa, ask mood ring, why is my ring yellow?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
